public class Console
extends org.eclipse.ui.console.MessageConsole
implements org.eclipse.jface.util.IPropertyChangeListener

MxUpdate specific eclipse plug-in console.

streams

private final Map<ConsolePreference,org.eclipse.ui.console.MessageConsoleStream> streams
Map of all console streams depending on the log level (and the different colors for each console).

println

private void println(ConsolePreference _logLevel,
                     String _text,
                     Throwable _e)
Prints a text and stack trace of related exception. The MxUpdate console is always shown before the text is printed.

Parameters:
_logLevel - log level (used to add to the output)
_text - text to print
_e - exception with stack trace (or null if no exception is defined)

dispose

protected void dispose()
If the console is removed, also the event listening on the preferences must be removed.

Overrides:
dispose in class org.eclipse.ui.console.IOConsole

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(org.eclipse.jface.util.PropertyChangeEvent _event)
If the console preferences are changed with the console preference page ConsolePreferencesPage all streams must be updated to new defined colors.

Specified by:
propertyChange in interface org.eclipse.jface.util.IPropertyChangeListener
Parameters:
_event - property change event (not used)
See Also:
